lankawata rediyo eka aawa.samaharu hithuwa eeka mara wadak kiyala.ujaruwata kana palenna anith minissunta karadara wena widiyata rediyo dana pirisak bihi wuna.eeta passe ti wi aawa.supurudu paridi ek buddhimath waga penwanna kamathi pirisak ek anthayakata gihin waradima kiwuwa.thawa pirisak hondama kiwuwa.thorala berala niyama swabhawaya kiyapu ayath hitiya(mata hithenne ee aya thama saba buddhimaththu).eekatath pirisak abbahi wuna.kopi kade welawata banata hamuduruwek wadamma ganna bari kalayak uda wuna.lankawe sanghadhikarana ehema mokata thiyanawada manda.eeta passe mobayil fon aawa.hora mara kam wadi weyi kiwuwa.thawa 1000k jathi kiwuwa.samaharunta fon katha karanna bhawitha karana upakaranayak newe sobhanayak wuna.ape kattiya kohomath aluth deyak kalathurakin soya gaththata anun hadapuwa karagahagena naya yawanna dassayine :) .
